LanguageData.SaM_Placeworker_OnSupport: Must be placed on a wall or rock.
LanguageData.SaM_Placeworker_Walkable: Must be facing a walkable tile.
LanguageData.SaM_Settings_editOnBuild_description: Opens the edit tab when a sign/memorial has been built. Default (no)
LanguageData.SaM_Settings_pauseOnEdit_description: Toggles the game paused (if not already) when editing a sign. Default (no)
